level.heading: Removal of directors and officers; vote required for approval; vacancies.
level.text: A director or officer may be removed, with or without cause, by a vote of 2/3 of the members voting at a regular or special meeting. The director or officer involved shall have an opportunity to be heard at the meeting. A vacancy caused by any such removal shall be filled by the vote provided in the bylaws for election of directors.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.
